To the NSFW creators reacting to the the BS payment processors have been on in general, a call to action: 
the ACLU now has a petition on MasterCard and will likely use it to assess the legal resources to assign to this case.  Sign and let them know this is important!

Writing is a skill.
Sculpting is a skill.
Drawing is a skill.
Acting is a skill.

Skills can be learned, honed, perfected.

While there are people using AI as accessibility devices, the majority using them just don't want to do the work. They want to farm the people who DID invest the time.

Eyo, just a little heads up for artists. 👀

When someone comments under your post "What is this artstyle called?", do not answer it in a serious manner.

They're asking for prompts they can put in midjourney to generate art.
I've seen it a lot on pinterest and twitter. just block them, if possible.

A quick tip about hashtags, feeds and searches for Blue Sky!

Feeds are what you subscribe to in order to find new stuff you are interested in. Your pinned feeds appear at the top of your page. You have control over what feeds you see. You can sub to as many as you want. Unsub from ones you don't. 🗑️
Hey folks, if you have trouble seeing videos or gifs on Bluesky, that's because the settings for it are automatically turned off. Go into your settings and go to "external media"

Its been a while but I’m still pretty proud of this piece. My warlock/bard Rylmyr, waiting for his next client. My first attempt at an actual background. A reference to E.J. Bellocq’s photograph, “The prostitute”, 1912. (I snuck it in the bottom right picture frame on the wall!)

To the inevitable flood of incoming new users:

1)  Be a decent human being
2)  Trans women are women, trans men are men, nonbinary people are valid
3)  Block immediately and whenever you need to
4)  If you're not decent to others, you will get reported and blocked yourself
